verses.text: Mamin Jehová, tzach in b'itej yed' in vach' lolonel, yujto ix in a sik'q'ue vaan d'a scal in nivan yaelal, maj in a cha b'uchjoc yuj eb' ayoch ajk'olal d'ayin.
Mamin, in Diosal ach, ix in k'an a colval, ix ak'an b'oxoc in k'ool.
Mamin, a ach ton ix in a colel d'a chamel. Ix ak' in q'uinal, maj in a chab'atlaj d'a scal eb' chamnac.
B'itananhec d'a Jehová, mach ex to schonhab' ex, b'itejec yujto anhej Te Nivan Yelk'ochi.
Yujto junnhej rato ay yoval sk'ool, axo svach'k'olal aynhejek' d'a masanil tiempo. Vach'chom tzonh ok' d'ak'valil, axo yic sq'uinhib'i sja co tzalajk'olal.
Ayic te vach' vaji, ix in na' icha tic: Malaj b'aq'uinh ol in telvoc yuj junoc tas, xin chi.
Mamin Jehová, yuj val svach'il a k'ool, ix in ak'canoch b'aj malaj tas tzin ik'ani. Palta ayic ix ik'anel a b'a d'ayin, ix somchajcanel in k'ool.
Mamin, ix ach vavtej, ix valan in b'a d'ayach:

¿Tasto a ganar d'ayin, q'uinaloc tato tzin chami, tzin mucchaji? Manhxo ol yal-laj ach sb'itan eb' toxo ix och pococal. Manh ol yal pax laj yalan vach' lolonel eb' d'ayach yuj svach'il tas ix a b'o'o, xin chi.
Mamin Jehová, ab' val tas svala', ok'oc val a k'ool d'ayin. Mamin, ochannhej ved'oc.
Ix ak'an q'uexmaj in yaelal d'a tzalajk'olal. Ix ik'anel in cusk'olal, ix ak'ancanoch k'apac pichul yic q'uinh in pichuloc.
Yuj val chi' jun, ach Jehová in Diosal, max yal-laj vem numan. Tzin b'itan d'ayach d'a aloj vach' lolonel yed' ak'oj yuj diosal d'ayach d'a masanil tiempo.
